uploader.description: CONF_MESSAGE[PlUpload uploader support. Requires downloading and installing the PLupload sources.]
uploader.label: CONF_MESSAGE[PLUploader]

global_param.name: RUNTIMES
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Runtimes]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Defines which runtimes are to be used and in what order, separated by comma. Currently html5,silverlight,flash,html4 are supported.]

global_param.name: MAX_FILE_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Maximum File Size]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Defines maximum size of files to be transferred, such as 4096mb.]

global_param.name: CHUNK_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Chunk Size]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Defines chunk size to be used, such as 512k, 2mb. If empty then maximum system settings are used.]
